title: JavaScript Demos in 140 Characters
summary: A popular Hacker News post featuring JavaScript demonstrations created using Dwitter.net, a platform dedicated to showcasing tiny JavaScript programs limited to 140 characters. The post generated significant community interest with 181 points and 40 comments, highlighting the creative potential of JavaScript when developers are constrained by strict character limits. The demonstrations showcase stunning visual animations and generative art created with minimal code, appealing to developers interested in code golf, creative coding, and JavaScript capabilities.
